summary: Request to add workflow logging capability in PHP SDK, similar to functionality available in Java and other SDKs. Users need a standardized way to add logs within workflow classes.
userImpact: Users cannot easily add logs to workflow classes in PHP SDK, limiting debugging and observability compared to other Temporal SDKs.
proposedFix: Implement workflow logger similar to Java SDK's Workflow.getLogger() method
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented and issue closed
keyQuote: Possibility to add logs in workflow class like in others SDK
